text: Applicants licensed under the waiver provisions of this subchapter shall be eligible for license renewal on the same terms as all other licensed respiratory care practitioners.
historical:

title.text: District of Columbia Boards and Commissions. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Waiver of Licensure Requirements for Respiratory Care Practitioners.
